nodes.text: 1138 was a B1-series battle droid serving under the Trade Federation Droid Army during the Naboo Crisis. 1138 took part on the Battle of Naboo under the command of OOM-9. The droids were able to create a victory for the Federation, but this was short lived, as every Federation battle droid was shut down when Anakin Skywalker destroyed the Droid Control Ship above Naboo.

1138 was created for George Lucas' 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, and was featured as both an animatronic model and a computer generated character. The character's identification number is featured on its back, and is one of the many references to Lucas' debut feature film, THX 1138.
